Game: Ant Nation 2009-07-13T00:00:00-07:00 Ant Nation is a real time strategy video game from Konami for WiiWare and Nintendo DS. The WiiWare version was released on July 13, 2009 in North America and the Nintendo DS version was released on September 8, 2009. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/adccdb70-df26-4dcd-ba05-91d6c77b9775.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/f76b76c4-3af7-4012-81bf-687d0003addf.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/6dec6a11-2d30-4406-bce2-1cbd86b05099.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/e1bb21f2-4f9c-45ce-a7a7-323b0aaac918.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/5c75cc26-4761-4484-a7c8-54931b9a8dbe.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ant_Nation Konami Konami
